review: The experience was fabulous. Just what one would want from their dental care takers.  Dr.Akhil is very skilled with his craft and his team too is very caring and careful when it comes to your dental work. The entire process is seamless and there isn't any hidden charges or issues. The clinic is clean and caters to one's needs very well.  Watching Netflix while having your teeth worked on is a first for me and I must say was indeed a very memorable experience. I'd recommend everyone to give this experience a try atleast once, you and your teeth won't regret this decision one bit.

It was a wonderful experience visiting Nitrodentist and interacting with Dr Akhil Patil. He is a thorough professional and gives consultation with utmost care while focusing on minute details. My dental procedure was completely painless and had great overall feeling. I would definitely like to recommend Nitrodentist and especially Dr Akhil Patil.
